tool_description: Newslookup.com is a news search engine, news aggregator, and news services provider.  We provide subscription based API access to our crawler and search index.
name: Newslookup.com Crawler Feeds
title: Newslookup.com Crawler Feeds

api_list.name: Crawler Feeds

required_parameters.name: package
required_parameters.description: Crawler feed packages. See readme for a complete list of packages.

optional_parameters.name: fmt
optional_parameters.description: Field Format. 0 = Default. Provides article title, link, description,  category, publication date, site url/name and article ID. 1 = Above items with meta keywords, meta description, referrer link and geo region id(s). 2 = Above items with article words extract. 3 = All of the above and link to cached copy. Note: fields returned are dependent on availability in article source.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: To optimize performance and reduce bandwidth, retrieve records greater than this record id.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the amount of records returned.

optional_parameters.name: mt
optional_parameters.description: Media Type: 1 = Internet, 2 = Magazine, 3 = News Agencies, 4 = Newspapers, 5 = Radio, 6 = Television

optional_parameters.name: subject
optional_parameters.description: 13 = Business 4  = Commentary 23 = Crypto Currencies 7  = Entertainment 18 = Environment 16 = Health 17 = Internet: Domain Names 14 = IT 11 = Lead Headline 21 = Libraries/Archives 2  = Local News 10 = National News 3  = Politics 15 = Press Releases 20 = Radio 9  = Science 6  = Sports 22 = Tech:Network Security 5  = Technology 8  = Travel 1  = World News

optional_parameters.name: politics
optional_parameters.description: Currently assigned only for select US political sites.   9  = Communist, 1  = Conservative, 2  = Democrat, 13 = Leans Left, 12 = Leans Right, 4  = Liberal, 3  = Libertarianism, 5  = Neo-Conservative, 11 = Non-Partisan, 10 = Paleo-Conservative, 6  = Progressive, 7  = Republican, 8  = Socialist

api_list.name: Search Feeds

required_parameters.name: s
required_parameters.description: Sort. Defaults to relevance, 1 = by date.

required_parameters.name: package
required_parameters.description: Search feed packages. See readme for a complete list of packages.

optional_parameters.name: fmt
optional_parameters.description: Field Format. 0 = Default. Provides article title, link, description,  category, publication date, site url/name and article ID. 1 = Above items with meta keywords, meta description, referrer link and geo region id(s). 2 = Above items with article words extract. 3 = All of the above and link to cached copy. Note: fields returned are dependent on availability in article source.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the amount of records returned.

optional_parameters.name: mt
optional_parameters.description: Media Type: 1 = Internet, 2 = Magazine, 3 = News Agencies, 4 = Newspapers, 5 = Radio, 6 = Television

optional_parameters.name: subject
optional_parameters.description: 13 = Business 4  = Commentary 23 = Crypto Currencies 7  = Entertainment 18 = Environment 16 = Health 17 = Internet: Domain Names 14 = IT 11 = Lead Headline 21 = Libraries/Archives 2  = Local News 10 = National News 3  = Politics 15 = Press Releases 20 = Radio 9  = Science 6  = Sports 22 = Tech:Network Security 5  = Technology 8  = Travel 1  = World News

optional_parameters.name: politics
optional_parameters.description: Currently assigned only for select US political sites.   9  = Communist, 1  = Conservative, 2  = Democrat, 13 = Leans Left, 12 = Leans Right, 4  = Liberal, 3  = Libertarianism, 5  = Neo-Conservative, 11 = Non-Partisan, 10 = Paleo-Conservative, 6  = Progressive, 7  = Republican, 8  = Socialist

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: See documentation for a list of region group ID's.

optional_parameters.name: dt
optional_parameters.description: Date range. Default is last 60 days.  Last number of days specified in minutes.
